tier.item: c. ama gblO be ye~-o Nku nyOnuvi hi dze ye~ gbO
ama say that LOG eye girl WH stay LOG side
Translation: Ama said she remembered the girl who (had) stayed with her.
Situation: Ama said: "I remember the girl who stayed with me"
